nodes.text: Soups were a food item served in liquid form, sometimes alongside salads or meats. They could be thickened for a better taste. It was also used as a metaphor for a particularly thick atmosphere.
Two types of Mandalorian soups included gi dumpling and red gourd soups, and both were served at a cantina in the town of Enceri on Mandalore.
Zao would often cook soup, and had a recipe for a cold melon soup.
